Nephrotic syndrome may go away once the underlying cause has been treated. More information about treating the underlying causes of nephrotic syndrome is provided in the NIDDK health topic, Glomerular Diseases.",NIDDK,Nephrotic Syndrome in Adults
What to do for Nephrotic Syndrome in Adults ?,"Eating, diet, and nutrition have not been shown to play a role in causing or preventing nephroti
